title: CrossLinkNet: An Explainable and Trustworthy AI Framework for Whole-Slide Images Segmentation
details: P Xiao, Q Zhong, J Chen, D Wu, Z Qin, E Zhou
abstract: In the intelligent medical diagnosis area, Artificial Intelligence (AI)'s trustworthiness, reliability, and interpretability are critical, especially in cancer diagnosis. Traditional neural networks, while excellent at processing natural images, often lack …
